select
from pi_acquisition where 1 = 1
and id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and acq_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.acqName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and author_end LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.authorEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and author_start LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.authorStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and channel_id = #{EntityRelated.channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and content_end LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.contentEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and content_prefix LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.contentPrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and content_start LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.contentStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and description_end LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.descriptionEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and description_start LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.descriptionStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and dynamic_addr LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.dynamicAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND unix_timestamp(end_time)>=unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.beginEndTime})
AND unix_timestamp(end_time)<unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.endEndTime})
and id = #{EntityRelated.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and img_prefix LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.imgPrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and keywords_end LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.keywordsEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and keywords_start LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.keywordsStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and link_end LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.linkEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and link_start LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.linkStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and linkset_end LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.linksetEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and linkset_start LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.linksetStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and origin_end LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.originEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and origin_start LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.originStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and page_encoding LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.pageEncoding,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and pagination_end LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.paginationEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and pagination_start LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.paginationStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and plan_list LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.planList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and releaseTime_end LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.releaseTimeEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and releaseTime_format LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.releaseTimeFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and releaseTime_start LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.releaseTimeStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and repeat_check_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.repeatCheckType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and site_id = #{EntityRelated.siteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND unix_timestamp(start_time)>=unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.beginStartTime})
AND unix_timestamp(start_time)<unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.endStartTime})
and title_end LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.titleEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and title_start LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.titleStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and type_id = #{EntityRelated.typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and user_id = #{EntityRelated.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and view_end LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.viewEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and view_id_end LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.viewIdEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and view_id_start LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.viewIdStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and view_link LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.viewLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and view_start LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.viewStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by
${Order.columnName}
ASC
DESC
